Text:
Thanks a lot, excellent quality.
I have a strong feeling that the acpect ratio is wrong,
I've checked out IMDB but there's no information.
If any body can tell, please let us all know.
If you're playing this on your PC use VLC and change the aspect ratio to 2:221 and that should do the trick.

Vanvanero@
OK, thanks. I couldn't make up my mind between 2:21.1 and 2:35.1

OK, we have a new bidder.
I hear 2:35.1 once... twice... sold to Mr. nicemonkeyboy for a big thanks.
